en.knee-hip-osteoarthritis-subtitle: Modern and effective treatments for osteoarthritis
en.acl-reconstruction-subtitle: Dr. Poletti is one of the leading knee and hip reconstructive surgeons in Málaga and Cádiz

en.knee-hip-surgery-description: Dr. Fabian Poletti is a renowned Orthopedic Surgeon and Traumatologist specializing in Knee and Hip Surgery, Sports Traumatology, Regenerative Medicine, and Orthobiologics (Platelet-Rich Plasma, Hyaluronic Acid, Stem Cells, etc.).
